thread.title: MICHAEL and Elwyn Austin
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MICHAEL and Elwyn Austin

author: MICHAEL and Elwyn Austin
title: MICHAEL and Elwyn Austin
text: I had a medical condition when I travelled to Perth and unfortunately could not pick the vehicle up at the required date as everything was pre paid. The staff understood my predicament and I picked the vehicle up three days later. The staff were courteous at the beginning and also when we returned the vehicle to the airport. I would recommend Red Spot Rentals as everything was easy, great staff and they were eager to help us in any way.
